title: A Bolder New Wave of Scandinavian Design for 2025
description: The Nordic style has always been close to my heart because it’s calm, clear, and connected to nature. There is nothing more grounding and inspiring to me than a neutral living space with a few colors as accents - think rust red, terracotta, green or dusty rose. But in 2025, Scandinavian design feels a bit more rebellious…
author: Holly Becker

title: Micro Interior Trend for 2025: Cool Metals
description: This year, Milan Design Week signaled a luminous shift in interior aesthetics. Cool metal finishes such as chrome, aluminum, and mirrored surfaces emerged as the defining materials, introducing a bit of reflective luxury.
author: Holly Becker

title: A Chair Inspired by Bike Racks
description: The term "street furniture" obviously refers to objects on streets. But NYC-based industrial designer Nik Bentel was inspired by a ubiquitous piece of street furniture, the bike rack, to design something similar for inside the home. His Loopy Chair draws on the same manufacturing techniques used to produce bike racks, here pressed into the service of creating seating. The powder-coated steel chair can be ordered with a suspended seat made of cloth-wrapped foam. It's not in production by a major manufacturer, but Nik Bentel Studio has taken the increasingly popular approach of batch-producing a limited run. They go for $3,000 a pop.
author: Rain Noe

title: Whirlpool's Retrofittable, Rotating Lower-Level Dishwasher Rack Improves Accessibility
description: Whirlpool's new Spin&Load Dishwasher Rack is designed to improve accessibility. The lower-level rack can rotate a full 360 degrees, making it easier for those with mobility issues to access all parts of it. You don't have to buy a new Whirlpool machine just to get the rack; it can be retrofitted into 24" wide machines made by Amana, JennAir, KitchenAid, Maytage and Whirlpool. A complete list of model compatibility is here.The product grew out of an internal initiative known as AVID (Awareness of Visible and Invisible Disabilities), whereby company interns engaged in a design competition to create a more inclusive product. Company engineers then ran with the winning design, collaborating with the United Spinal Association for feedback, as well as conducting separate user testing. This design is a great example of a company pushing farther, of their own initiative, to solve more people's problems. With any luck, competitors will take note and end users will benefit.The Spin&Load rack is available for $150.
author: Rain Noe

title: EASY and Delicious No Bake Peanut Butter Pie
description: Delicious and easy no-bake peanut butter pie recipe. No oven needed for this creamy and fluffy pie! I don't claim to be a fantastic cook or baker. But every once and awhile I open my recipe binder (it creaks and a cloud of dust poofs out) and find one I love and I just have to share. You will thank me for this one! :) I’ve made this “pie” for years, but for some reason it’s been a while since I last did. And now that we’ve had it again, I’m quite sure I’ll be making it weekly. Or so. It’s SO easy. And insanely good. You will LOVE it. That is, if you like peanut butter. Or chocolate. Or sugar. This peanut butter pie is a great recipe for the warmer months, because there's no oven needed! But it's also a staple for a holiday meal. title: How to Plant and Grow the Beautiful Peony
description: Tons of tips on growing peony flowers with ease. This beautiful flowering perennial is easy to grow once you find the perfect spot in your garden. Peonies are one of my all time favorite cut flowers -- the blooms are so full and lush and sometimes incredibly fragrant! Even the foliage is a deep, pretty green...the combination makes for stunning bouquets and arrangements.I'm sharing all the tips you'll need to grow these gorgeous flowers! Peonies can be a bit finicky at first, but once they're established you will rarely need to touch them again. They are seriously one of the most glorious flowers I've ever seen. So fluffy and delicate. And the scent -- if you're lucky enough to have a type of peony with fragrance, it is truly intoxicating.  This post may contain affiliate links for your convenience.I may earn a small commission when you make a purchase through links. See my policies and disclosure page for more information. Here's everything you need to know about planting and growing peonies!Read the full postThis content is property of Thrifty Decor Chick LLC. description: I know a house always evolves to work with a family's changing needs, but I'd say this kitchen and attached sitting area are as close to absolutely done as ever. In fact over the last two years they've held pretty steady - we did update the kitchen light to my dream chandelier that looks like bubbles at a beach sunset. And before that we finally settled on the right seating that fit perfectly into the seating area. But yeah, since then... settled! So it felt like it was finally time to share how it all turned out.
